Articles.Content:
I have no clue how to do it, but I was thinking, what if Kerbin was part of a Binary-Planet system, with a twin planet of equal size and mass?

keep the Mun orbiting around Kerbin, but the twin planet should be placed out in Minmus' orbit, and Minmus should orbit the twin.

the twin could be named "Dos" (Spanish for Two) and it would give SSTO planes a place to fly other than Laythe, plus an excellent place to practice gravity assists.
